snippet: David Wilson punctuated his three touchdowns last week with back flips in the end zone. The fans likely loved it, but it was hardly a way to make friends with Coach Tom Coughlin.
abstract: David Wilson punctuated his three touchdowns last week with back flips in the end zone. The fans likely loved it, but it was hardly a way to make friends with Coach Tom Coughlin.

headline.main: Week 15 Matchups: No Need to Flip
headline.print_headline: Hoping To Celebrate, Minus the Flip
